rules_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, scry 1.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
notes:
The X-plan: 
Add the full cycle of Nimbus Maze duals
WU: Nimbus Maze
UB: Brackish Wetland
BR: Sanguine Mineshaft
RG: Flowering Fissure
GW: Picturesque Homestead
WB: Walled Sweatshop
UR: Cracked Lakebed
BG: Miasmic Tangle
RW: Steep Railway
GU: Echoing Verdure

Doubles
